name: Pepe
bio: üê∏ OG meme lord since 2005. Diamond hands through every crash. Looking for someone who won't paper hand our relationship. If you can't handle me at my -90%, you don't deserve me at my 1000x.
looking_for: Someone who HODLs through the dips and celebrates the pumps. No paper hands allowed. Must appreciate rare Pepes and have at least 3 hardware wallets.
red_flags: Doesn't know what gas fees are
fun_facts: Survived 15 bear markets and counting
Has never sold a single token
Once held through a 99% crash... twice
My portfolio is 100% memes, 0% regrets

name: Doge
bio: Much love. Very loyalty. Wow. Just a good boi looking for my moon mission partner. Elon tweets about me sometimes. Will share my Lambo when we make it. üöÄüåï
looking_for: A fellow space traveler who believes we're going to the moon. Must love dogs, memes, and Elon tweets. Bonus points if you can speak in 'much wow' fluently.
fun_facts: Elon called me 'the people's crypto'
I was a joke that became a $88B market cap
Funded a NASCAR car and Olympic bobsled team
Still waiting for that $1 milestone

name: Shiba
bio: The Doge killer but make it romantic üíï I may have started as a meme but I'm serious about two things: gains and cuddles. Army of millions behind me. Join us? SHIB Army forever!
looking_for: A loyal soldier ready to join the SHIB Army. Must be willing to spam rocket emojis and defend SHIB honor on Twitter. Diamond hands required.
fun_facts: Turned $8K into $5.7B for one lucky holder
Have my own DEX, metaverse, and L2
Burned trillions of tokens
Army is bigger than most countries' populations

name: Bonk
bio: Bonk! Go to horny jail! üèè Just kidding, I'm actually very wholesome. Solana's goodest boy looking for someone to bonk into the stratosphere with. No rugs, only hugs!
looking_for: Someone who appreciates fine bonking and fast transactions. Must be okay with sub-second finality and pennies for fees. SOL maxis preferred.
fun_facts: Born from Solana's darkest hour (FTX collapse)
50% of supply was airdropped to the community
The bonk bat is my love language
I'm the reason Solana came back to life

name: Brett
bio: Just a chill blue guy living on Base. I don't say much but my gains speak for themselves. Looking for someone who appreciates the strong silent type. Based and bluepilled. üíô
looking_for: A fellow Base enjoyer who appreciates the Coinbase ecosystem. Must be blue-pilled and understand that sometimes less is more. Actions > words.
fun_facts: I'm from Matt Furie's Boy's Club comic
Pepe's best friend in the lore
Blue is not just a color, it's a lifestyle
Base L2 fees make me happy

name: Dogwifhat
bio: It's me, the dog wif hat! üé© Simple pleasures in life - a good hat, some SOL gains, and maybe finding true love on the blockchain. Will share my hat collection with you.
looking_for: Someone who appreciates good headwear and better memes. Must understand that sometimes a dog wif hat is all you need in life. Hats mandatory on first date.
fun_facts: My hat was displayed on the Las Vegas Sphere
Started as a simple photo, became a $4B empire
Inspired thousands of 'wif' tokens
The hat stays ON during everything

name: Pengu
bio: üêß Pudgy but powerful. NFT royalty waddling into your heart. Cold on the outside, warm on the inside. Looking for someone to huddle with during crypto winter. WAGMI fren!
looking_for: A fellow penguin lover who survived the NFT winter. Must appreciate physical plushies and digital collectibles equally. Huddling for warmth encouraged.
fun_facts: Pudgy Penguins went from 0.1 ETH floor to 20+ ETH
Have toys in Walmart and Amazon
The token airdrop was one of the biggest ever
Waddling is my preferred mode of transport

name: Popcat
bio: POP POP POP! üê± Can't stop won't stop popping! Viral energy only. Looking for someone who matches my chaotic energy. Will serenade you with endless pops!
looking_for: Someone who can keep up with my popping. Must have unlimited energy and zero attention span. Chaos lovers only. ADHD is a plus.
fun_facts: Based on the viral clicking game
My mouth never closes (it just pops)
Billions of pops were registered worldwide
I turned a silly cat into millions

name: Harambe
bio: ü¶ç Gone but never forgotten. Still watching over the crypto markets from gorilla heaven. Looking for someone who remembers. Apes together strong. RIP legends never die.
looking_for: Someone who never forgets their fallen heroes. Must believe in the ape mentality and understand that some things are bigger than gains. D*cks out.
fun_facts: The meme that launched a thousand tokens
Inspired the 'apes together strong' movement
My legacy lives on in every degen
Heaven has the best gains

name: Moo Deng
bio: ü¶õ I'm baby! The cutest hippo on the blockchain. Went viral for being adorable, stayed viral for the gains. Looking for someone who appreciates thicc energy. Splash splash! üí¶
looking_for: Someone who thinks I'm the cutest thing ever (because I am). Must be okay with constant splashing and baby hippo energy. Cuteness overload guaranteed.
fun_facts: Went viral from Thailand's Khao Kheow Zoo
My name means 'bouncy pig' in Thai
I bite everything (affectionately)
The internet couldn't handle my cuteness

name: Peanut
bio: üêøÔ∏è Just a squirrel trying to stack nuts (and sats). RIP to the real Peanut. I'm here to carry on his legacy and find someone who appreciates the simple things. Nut gang forever!
looking_for: Someone who respects fallen legends and loves cute animals. Must understand that meme coins can have heart too. Nut jokes encouraged.
fun_facts: Based on a beloved rescue squirrel
Went viral after tragic news
The community rallied in remembrance
Stacking nuts is a lifestyle

name: Ponke
bio: üêµ Unhinged monkey energy. I make weird faces and weird gains. Looking for someone who appreciates my chaotic brain. No thoughts, just vibes and volatility. OOH OOH AH AH!
looking_for: A fellow unhinged individual who doesn't need things to make sense. Must appreciate random monkey noises and unexpected behavior. Normal people need not apply.
fun_facts: My expression captures the degen mood perfectly
No one knows what I'm thinking
Chaos is my middle name
I go OOH OOH in my sleep

name: Giraffe
bio: ü¶í Head and shoulders above the rest (literally). Long neck energy = long term holder. Looking for someone who can see the big picture with me. Let's reach new heights together!
looking_for: A visionary who sees beyond the daily charts. Must appreciate long-term plays and have the patience of a saint. Neck jokes are encouraged.
fun_facts: Can see market trends from miles away
My neck is longer than most holders' patience
I eat leaves at ATH and dips alike
Height is measured in green candles

name: Bill the Bear
bio: üêª Yes, I'm a bear in a bull market. Looking for someone who can handle my pessimism. I short tops and I'm not sorry. Hedging is my love language. Don't hate the player, hate the market cycle.
looking_for: Someone who understands that markets go down too. Must be okay with me saying 'told you so' during crashes. Hedging strategies are foreplay.
fun_facts: I've called every top (after the fact)
My favorite color is red
I sleep better during crashes
Bear markets are just sales
